main event: A vaguely spherical object was observed over Tioga, North Dakota on August 3, 1958.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 60-70 feet in diameter,The object was white to yellowish-white in color,There was no sound, no trail or exhaust from the object,An interceptor aircraft was dispatched but did not find the object,The sighting was reported by a reliable ground observer from the USAF.
